text: Itte yaru ga ī. `Arrā no omoto no ōhō de, sore yori mo warui mono o, anata gata ni tsugeyou ka. Sore wa arrā ga mihanashita mono, o ikari o hi mutta-sha, saru matawa buta to sa reta mono, soshite yokoshima kaminitsukaeru-sha, kare-ra wa, aku no kyōchi ni ori,(tadashī) michi kara tōku mayoi satta-sha-tachi de aru
